`Registered Attendees (10)`

August 28, 2023 speaker is [Federica Gazzelloni](https://federicagazzelloni.netlify.app/) on behalf of [R-Ladies Rome](https://rladiesrome.quarto.pub/website)

**Missed Our Thrilling Bioconductor Watch Party? Catch it on YouTube!**

If you couldn't make it to our R/Bioconductor Watch Party, don't worry; we've got you covered! The event was a smashing success, and now you have the chance to experience it from the comfort of your screen.

üî• **You Shouldn't Miss This Recording!**

**Cutting-Edge Talks:** Dive into the latest developments in bioinformatics, data science, and R programming. We watched selected talks from the Bioconductor Conference 2023, covering a wide range of captivating topics. (Full list of talks here: [BioC23 Playlist on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLdl4u5ZRDMQRVvXBi29h7MDtRn-AQGlXS))

**Flexible Viewing:** Whether you're a night owl or an early bird, you can watch the recording at your convenience. Pause, rewind, and take notes as you explore the world of bioinformatics.
